task.title: Export Media from Media Player
task.shortdesc: Export clips of your media file from the Media Player view.

taskbody.prereq: A media file must be linked to your session.

step.cmd: Click the arrow at the bottom right of the media field.
step.stepresult: This will open a context menu with the options Take snapshot, Export media..., Go to..., Go to end of segmented media.If you wish to export the segment for a particular record, this record must be displayed in Record Data.

step.cmd: Click the Export media... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will bring you to the Export Media window.

step.cmd: Select the destination directory for your exported media clip. To do so, click the Browse button to the right of the Output file field. Specify file name and location for your clip and click Save.
step.stepresult: The directory and file name you chose will appear in the Output file field.By default, your media clip will save in <project_name>/__res/media/segments/.

step.cmd: Specify Extract segment, Include video, Include audio, and Other arguments details and click Next.
step.stepresult: This action will activate the export.If you choose not to Extract segment, the entire media file will be exported.

step.cmd: Once the PhonWorker shutdown alert appears at the bottom of the Export media window, click the Close button.
step.stepresult: Your media clip will be exported to the specified directory.
